QuestData.Title: The Calm Before the Storm
QuestData.Description:
The Nokhud are powerful and have many allies. It will take all we have to withstand them.
$n, you have the Khanam Matra's trust. Her orders were to rally our friends and prepare our people.
I need your help. Seek Hojin to mobilize the remaining khansguard. Alert Scout Khenyug to possible Nokhud incursions. Inform Agura to expect wounded, and tell Gensai to prepare our provisions.
As for the mystics, I believe they left recently. I will see if any remain in Teerakai.
QuestData.LogDescription: Communicate Jebotai's orders to the townsfolk of Teerakai.
QuestData.RewardText: I did not wish to cause a panic, but the people must be ready. Clan Nokhud is not known for mercy.
